# Abstract

Here, I re-examine the analysis of Oeppen and Vaupel (2002).

# Life Expectancy Analysis

```{r}
library(tidyverse)


sumdat <- gapminder::gapminder_unfiltered |>
  group_by(country, year) |>
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp))

```
